about_the_game:
This game is an online First person shooter game.

In the game there will be two teams for you to choose from, that is.

orange delivery
and
green delivery

In each game map, there will be weapons for you to choose from. You can choose your class before choosing a room to play.

The playing mode system is as follows.
- team deathmatch
Kill an opposing player
- free for all
Kill all players in the game.
- capture the flag
hoist the flag of the opposite side

You can increase or decrease the number of bots before starting the game.

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, when shooting, there will be a blood effect. and may use realistic weapons such as firearms, glass bottles

detailed_description:
This game is an online First person shooter game.

In the game there will be two teams for you to choose from, that is.

orange delivery
and
green delivery

In each game map, there will be weapons for you to choose from. You can choose your class before choosing a room to play.

The playing mode system is as follows.
- team deathmatch
Kill an opposing player
- free for all
Kill all players in the game.
- capture the flag
hoist the flag of the opposite side

You can increase or decrease the number of bots before starting the game.
legal_notice: Use Unity Engine Every Asset in this game come from unity asset store and mixamo and freesound.com
name: DeliverwarTH

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: INTEL I3 I5 I7 gen 2-3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT1030 - GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 697 MB available space
  • VR Support: NO
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: INTEL I3 I5 I7 gen 2-3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 697 MB available space
  • VR Support: NO

agcom.descriptors:
You are a food delivery worker in Asia. There are two companies. Green food delivery company. and orange food delivery company The two companies have long been at odds of interest. And the conflict cannot be resolved by the company. therefore decided to fight for space

The game has 3 modes.

-Team DeathMatch

-FreeForall
Kill every player in the game

-Capture the flag
Capture food order flag

You can adjust the number of Bots and set various settings before starting the game.

And in the future there will be more new map updates in the future.
